    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] p)

      • simulate

        public static int[] simulate(int n,
             int r)
        Simulates r >= 0 rounds of the dice game and returns how often each of n >= 1 players has won. The return value is an array, where index 0 counts the number of rounds without winner, and index i > 0 counts the number of rounds won by player i.

      • simulate1round

        static int simulate1round(int n)
        Simulates one round of the game for n players. Returns the winner of the round, or NO_WINNER if there is no winner.

      • getRolls

        static int[] getRolls(int n)
        Returns array with n rolls: the first player rolls a dodecahedron; the other players roll two dice. N.B. The roll of player 1 is returned at index 0.

      • roll

        static int roll(int k)
        Rolls k-sided fair dice with values 1 through k.

      • getWinner

        static int getWinner(int[] rolls)
        Determine round winner, given the round rolls.

      • max

        static int max(int[] a)
        Returns maximum of a given integer array of non negative values. N.B. The array is not empty.

      • count

        static int count(int x,
        int[] a)
        Returns how many times value x occurs in array a.

      • find

        static int find(int x,
       int[] a)
        Finds a value x in array a, given that it occurs.
